name: Patagonia Baggies 7" Shorts - Men's
description: A classic from Patagonia, the Baggies could be the only boardshorts you need to pack for beach trips and long weekend getaways. Made from Supplex® recycled nylon with a DWR finish, they dry quickly and are tough enough for active days in the sand or on the water.Supplex® nylon is tough, quick-drying and 100% recycled.Elastic waistband with internal drawstring provides a flexible yet secure fit.Vertical side pockets are hydrodynamic when swimming and drain themselves when you get out, thanks to clever internal mesh corners.Rear snap pocket.7in. inseam hits above the knee, giving you lots of room to move.
